translation.value: Competition Rules[COMMENT: how to system; help string]
None[COMMENT: no financial fair play sanctions for a team, was previously 433578 but needed a bespoke version for some languages]
The club must keep total player wage expenditure below this amount in order to pass FFP rules[COMMENT: FFP (Financial Fair Play) label, hint text]
The total player wage expenditure allowed by the club over the course of the season[COMMENT: FFP (Financial Fair Play) label, hint text]
The total projected player wage expenditure by the club over the course of the season[COMMENT: FFP (Financial Fair Play) label, hint text]
If a club's total player expenditure is below this amount then they are exempt from FFP player wage sanctions[COMMENT: FFP (Financial Fair Play) label, hint text]
The next date when FFP checks will be applied to the club's financial accounts[COMMENT: FFP (Financial Fair Play) label, hint text]
